title: Johnnie Walker Whisky Workshop
subtitle: Giant Spoon, 2021
description: Johnnie Walker partnered with Brooklyn-based artist Mike Perry to produce a collection of cocktail accessories for the holiday season. To promote and sell them, we built a pop-up store in The Shops at Columbus Circle, complete with custom engraving stations and a sampling bar.

title: PMI Virtual Experience Series
subtitle: Liberty & Co., 2020-ongoing
description: To help PMI reimagine their yearly series of conferences for project management professionals in a virtual setting, we designed a suite of 3D-rendered backdrops for an online event platform. The backgrounds provide a visual metaphor related to the theme of each conference in the series, and have evolved to tell a growing story over the course of the years since it began.

title: Reacher Challenge
subtitle: Tool of N.A., 2021
description: To celebrate the premiere of Amazon Prime Video's newest series, we built a pop-up obstacle course in three cities and invited the public to recreate Jack Reacher's special-ops feats.
